articles.title: The Game Awards 2025 – Every Winner and Xbox Reveal Plus New Details on Control Resonant, Diablo IV, Tomb Raider, and More - Xbox Wire
articles.description: On behalf of the creative teams at Xbox, Bethesda Softworks, Activision, and Blizzard, we extend our heartfelt congratulations to this year’s winners and nominees at The Game Awards!

articles.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33's expansion is available right now, adding a photo mode and vibrant new world - Eurogamer
articles.description: The previously revealed expansion to Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has finally been properly unveiled, plus the game is heading to Switch 2.

articles.title: Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve Announced for PC and Consoles in First Trailer | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN
articles.description: Bandai Namco sped into The Game Awards 2025 to finally reveal Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve as the next entry in the long-running flight simulator series.

articles.title: Orbitals announced exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2 - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: During The Game Awards 2025 tonight, was announced exclusive for Nintendo Switch 2. The title launches sometime in 2026. Orbitals, a co-op space adventure game, comes from Kepler and Shapefarm. The goal of the game involves going on a search for the crumbling…

articles.title: Amazon's Tomb Raider Game First Look, Lara Croft Remake in 2026 - Variety

articles.title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight Release Date Announced | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN
articles.description: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight emerged from the shadows this evening at The Game Awards with a new trailer, revealing the anticipated adventure's release date.

articles.title: Gang of Dragon is Toshihiro Nagoshi's New Game, and It Sure Looks Like Yakuza | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN
articles.description: We just got our first look at the debut game from Nagoshi Studio, the studio formed by Toshihiro Nagoshi under NetEase after he departed Ryu Ga Gotoku in 2021. It's called Gang of Dragon, and it sure looks an awful lot like Yakuza!

articles.title: Warlock: Dungeons & Dragons Is A Dark Fantasy Open World Action Game Coming In 2027 - Game Informer
articles.description: Wield forbidden magic to take down dark forces in this single-player third-person action game.

articles.title: Capcom Finally Confirms Leon S. Kennedy Is In Resident Evil Requiem | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN
articles.description: After months of speculation and a revealing leak earlier this week, Capcom has finally, officially confirmed what we all knew: Leon S. Kennedy is in Resident Evil Requiem, and he's here to kick butt.

articles.title: The Game Awards statue was for Larian's new game, Divinity, a new RPG that's "even larger than Baldur's Gate 3 - Eurogamer

articles.description: The creator of Mario + Rabbids has revealed his next game, and it's a send up of the games industry as a mascot platformer: Bradley the Badger.

articles.title: Google launched its deepest AI research agent yet — on the same day OpenAI dropped GPT-5.2 - TechCrunch
articles.description: For the first time, developers can embed Google's Deep Research tool, based on Gemini 3 Pro, into their own apps.
